text: “obata biya ganva anaguru ængavima pinisa obagen keneku kerehi obage deviyan vetin oba venuven honda ovadan pæminima gænada oba puduma vanne? nuhge janatavagen pasu ohu obava (bhumiyehi adhipatin bavata pat kara, dehayenda, saktiyenda (an ayata vada) obata adhika vasayenma laba dima gænada sita balanu. allahge mema varaprasadayan siyalla oba sita balanu. (eyin) oba jayagrahanaya kala hækiya” (yayi pævasuveya)
